title: Chapter 941 - A Knock On The Forehead
body:
Chapter 941 - A Knock On The Forehead

“What did that young lord look like?” the woman asked suddenly.

The graying elder outside the pavilion hesitated before saying, “He looks seventeen or eighteen, and he’s quite handsome. His cultivation is in the Spiritual Revolution Realm….”

This description left the woman unwittingly stunned, and her enchanting eyes shone with strange light. She’d already guessed who the old man was describing!

After a moment’s thought, she said leisurely, “Go invite him over.”

However, the man seated across from her frowned. “That… It seems to me that wouldn’t be appropriate?” 

He was the overseer of the House of the Cicada, and his name was Yun Rong.

“That young lord and I are old acquaintances, and if I’m not mistaken, he’s here to ask about the changes to the Sea of Bitterness too,” the woman said calmly. “What’s ‘inappropriate’ about it?”

It was just a few light, airy sentences, but they put immense pressure on Yun Rong.

He took a deep breath, then said gravely, “Go invite that young lord over.”

“Yes, sir!” The graying old man scurried off to carry out his orders.

The woman, meanwhile, raised a delicate finger and twirled the blue hair by her temples. Inwardly,...
original_title: Chapter 941 - A Knock on the Forehead
